channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【New URLPattern API brings improved pattern matching to Node.js and Cloudflare Workers】新的urlpattern API为Node.js和Cloudflare工人带来了改进的图案匹配
item.description: 【 Today we're announcing our latest contribution to Node.js, now available in v23.8.0: URLPattern. 】今天，我们宣布对Node.js的最新贡献，现在在v23.8.0中提供：urlpattern。

item.title: 【RDP without the risk: Cloudflare's browser-based solution for secure third-party access】没有风险的RDP：CloudFlare的基于浏览器的解决方案，用于安全的第三方访问
item.description: 【 Cloudflare now provides clientless, browser-based support for the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). It enables secure, remote Windows server access without VPNs or RDP clients. 】CloudFlare现在为远程桌面协议（RDP）提供了无客户端，基于浏览器的支持。它可以在没有VPN或RDP客户端的情况下启用安全的远程Windows Server访问。

item.title: 【Improving Data Loss Prevention accuracy with AI-powered context analysis】通过AI驱动的上下文分析提高数据丢失的预防准确性
item.description: 【 Cloudflare’s Data Loss Prevention is reducing false positives by using a self-improving AI-powered algorithm, built on Cloudflare’s Developer Platform. 】CloudFlare的数据丢失预防是通过使用基于Cloudflare开发人员平台建造的自我提出的AI驱动算法来降低误报。

item.title: 【Prepping for post-quantum: a beginner’s guide to lattice cryptography】准备后量子：晶格密码学的初学者指南
item.description: 【 This post is a beginner's guide to lattices, the math at the heart of the transition to post-quantum (PQ) cryptography. It explains how to do lattice-based encryption and authentication from scratch. 】这篇文章是晶格的初学者指南，是过渡到后量化后（PQ）加密术的核心的数学指南。它解释了如何从头开始进行基于晶格的加密和身份验证。

item.title: 【Cloudflare is now IRAP assessed at the PROTECTED level, furthering our commitment to the global public sector】CloudFlare现在在受保护的层面上评估了IRAP，进一步提高了我们对全球公共部门的承诺
item.description: 【 Cloudflare is now assessed at the IRAP PROTECTED level, bringing our products and services to the Australian Public Sector. 】现在，CloudFlare在IRAP受保护的水平上进行了评估，将我们的产品和服务带给澳大利亚公共部门。

item.title: 【Detecting sensitive data and misconfigurations in AWS and GCP with Cloudflare One】检测AWS和GCP中的敏感数据和错误配置
item.description: 【 Using Cloudflare’s CASB, integrate, scan, and detect sensitive data and misconfigurations in your cloud storage accounts. 】使用Cloudflare的CASB，在您的云存储帐户中集成，扫描和检测敏感数据和错误配置。

item.title: 【Enhance data protection in Microsoft Outlook with Cloudflare One’s new DLP Assist】使用CloudFlare的新DLP辅助，在Microsoft Outlook中增强数据保护
item.description: 【 Customers can now easily safeguard sensitive data in Microsoft Outlook with our new DLP Assist feature. 】现在，客户可以使用我们的新DLP辅助功能轻松地在Microsoft Outlook中保护敏感数据。

item.title: 【Cloudflare named a leader in Web Application Firewall Solutions in 2025 Forrester report】CloudFlare在2025年Forrester报告中将Web应用程序解决方案的领导
item.description: 【 Forrester Research has recognized Cloudflare as a Leader in its The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025 report. 】Forrester Research已将CloudFlare认识到其Forrester Wave™中的领导者：Web应用程序防火墙解决方案，第1季度2025年报告。

item.title: 【Cloudflare incident on March 21, 2025】2025年3月21日的CloudFlare事件
item.description: 【 On March 21, 2025, multiple Cloudflare services, including R2 object storage experienced an elevated rate of error responses. Here’s what caused the incident, the impact, and how we are making sure it 】2025年3月21日，包括R2对象存储在内的多个CloudFlare服务的错误响应速度升高。这是导致事件，影响以及我们如何确保事件的原因

item.title: 【Security Week 2025: in review】安全周2025：审查
item.description: 【 Security Week 2025 has officially come to a close. Our updates for the week included a deep dive on our AI offering, a unified navigation experience, and an introduction to our AI Agent Cloudy. 】安全周2025已正式结束。我们本周的更新包括深入研究我们的AI产品，统一的导航体验以及对AI Agent Cloudy的介绍。
